text_block_list.name: Young Crown
text_block_list.text:
Papa! Mama! I want to go here! 
This "Satono Grand Resort" in Japan!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
I remember gripping a Satono Group promo magazine 
to the point of creasing it, as I badgered my busy parents 
until they gave in.

text_block_list.name: Young Crown
text_block_list.text:
真係 (Really)!? You'll take me there!? 
No taking it back, okay!? 多謝啊 (Thank you)!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
I also remember the girl shown alongside, 
with her sparkling smile.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: In——

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: In——

text_block_list.name: Cheval & Shion
text_block_list.text:
Incredible…. 
Incredible…!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Woohoooo! We're! Celebs! Nooow!!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: The "Satono Grand Resort"!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Fully furnished with hotels, shopping malls and activities 
utilising the natural environment! Garnering global acclaim, 
this dream residential resort is the pride of the Satonos!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Our goal here is to shoot PR photos to celebrate 
the completion of the renewal project! We're going 
to take some absolutely amazing shots!!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Wh… What do we do, Shion… Nobody told me that 
we were coming to such an incredible place…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
How do I put this… although we've already come all the 
way here… Are you really okay with us… as models?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Hehe, of course! I selected you myself, and I have no doubts in my judgement.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
This is an extensive PR project commemorating the completion 
of multi-year renewal works. Successfully executing it will be 
a great contribution to the group from my side ——

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
But really, I've loved this place ever since my parents 
brought me here as a child. That's why, personally, 
I also just more people to know of it.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
On that note, let's all put our hearts into this photo shoot. 
I have high expectations of you♪

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
Having accepted this role, we should strive 
for nothing but perfection. We'll give our all.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
That's the spirit! …Well, let's get started then! 
I've carefully crafted a plan for the photo shoot, 
so don't worry!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Let's put your natural charm on full display, Vivlos. 
Hit the camera with that energy!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Oookay, little camera☆ Don't hold back! 
Take aaall the snaps you want! Make them cute♪

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Fufun♪ Like this? Or… how about this? …Hey, Crown! What do you think?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: OK ya! Looks good to me!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
The plan for you two will center on bringing out Duramente's 
stylishness, and Shion's beautiful form from practicing ballet.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
…Duramente, you don't get nervous over things like this, 
do you. I admire that. I can't help but… feel jittery.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
I believe this is what it means to always be mentally 
prepared for anything. That readiness is something 
we all wish to learn from.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
Having photos taken is not a rare occurrence for me. 
Although, the purpose of these photos is slightly different.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Shion, you still seem a little uptight. 
How about having some tea to relax?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
…Cheval's next. The plan for her was to showcase 
her purity and honesty through a variety of poses 
against the scenery, but ——

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
…She's gone a different level of uptight over here. 
No need to worry, let's resume in the afternoon 
and take our minds off it for now.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
I was completely incapable of looking up… 
As I thought, modelling is too much for me…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
N-No, I can't stay like this. 
After all ——

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Mo… Model?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Yes. It's a job for the Satono Group, how does it sound? 
You can think of it as a photography tour at the resort.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Um… was everyone else unable to go?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
No… it's just that, my older sister and Vivlos are 
better suited to this kind of thing…

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
You're the first one I asked, you know, Cheval? 
If you're willing to join, I'm sure the photos will 
turn out amazing.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: W… Why do you think that…?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
You know, you are capable of shining much more brightly 
than you think. Your brilliance captivates many people… 
I want to capture that.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Me…?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Hehe. I hope you'll come.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
…I want to shine. Brightly, like Crown said I can. 
I want to meet her expectations… I have to.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Let's resume. Duramente, you can continue as you did 
in the morning. Shion, I've adjusted your poses and the 
shot angles so you can focus better, take a look.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Also, to change it up, let's adjust your hairstyle a little! 
I've already informed the stylist.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
You've taken a lot of effort for me… I feel sorry. 
…Tomorrow I'll definitely live up to your expectations.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Vivlos can feel free to continue the current 
approach of showcasing her natural charm.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Okaaay☆ 
I'll be in your care, camera crew♪

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Cheval… for now, let's get you used to being photographed. 
I've modified the plan so that you don't have to face the camera.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: O-Ok…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
This time… I will do it well…. 
Be… Befitting a model for a magazine…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
(That's right… I believe recently… sis did the cover for 
Twinkle Weekly… Recall… Recall…)

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: …Cheval? The shoot's about to start… Are you okay?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Huah!?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Hu… Huh…? Which way was I supposed to look again…? 
My pose, what was… umm, ummmm ——

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Like this! 
……….Eh?
